commands:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS 
        Schedule (
            `index` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
            title VARCHAR(255),
            who VARCHAR(255),
            entry_type VARCHAR(255),
            dctv_channel VARCHAR(255),
            start_date DATETIME,
            end_date DATETIME,
            includes VARCHAR(255),
            description TEXT,
            location VARCHAR(255),
            link VARCHAR(255),
            updated_at DATETIME,
            bookmarked INTEGER 
        );
